sub_title: Product@Mollie | PM Mentor@Seekamentor | Ex-Flipkart | MBA, IIM Bangalore
summary:
As a Product Manager at Mollie, I lead the Financial Monitoring domain with the aim of reducing risky merchants on the platform while maintaining a smooth lifecycle experience for good merchants. I own and manage the product vision, the roadmap, the OKRs, and the overall charter for the team. I also build products, platforms, and AI/ML solutions to proactively detect and minimize fraud and credit losses on the platform, as well as improve the efficiency of the Ops and Analytics teams.

I have a Master of Business Administration (MBA) from the Indian Institute of Management Bangalore (IIMB), where I also completed a Master in Management (MiM) term from ESCP Europe as part of an exchange program. I have over four years of experience in the Fraud & Risk domain, having previously worked as a Product Manager at Flipkart, where I managed the Trust and Safety domain and led the end-to-end AI/ML development in this area. 

I have co-founded a startup, filed a patent, published two papers, and won multiple awards for my academic and professional excellence. I am skilled in attention to detail, problem solving, and platform development. I am passionate about building innovative and impactful products that enhance the security and trust of online transactions.

I live in Amsterdam currently with my bicycle, Museum Card, and PS5.

treasury_media.title: Podcast with Tamal Dutta | Product@Flipkart
treasury_media.description: Check out my interview with GrowJunction where I talk about the skills you require to break into Product Management and how a day in the life of a PM looks like!

treasury_media.title: The Pros and Cons of Product Management by Tamal Dutta
treasury_media.description: Every coin has two sides and so does Product Management. In this podcast with Seekamentor, I talk about the pros and the cons of a career in Product Management to make the choice easier for aspirants!

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
~ Leading the Financial Monitoring domain for the company with the aim of reducing risky merchants on the platform while maintaining a smooth lifecycle experience for good merchants
~ Owning and managing the product vision, the roadmap, the OKRs and the overall charter for the team
~ Building a world-class Transaction Monitoring platform to detect Money Laundering, Sanctions Screening, and Terrorism Financing risks
~ Strategising and reducing risks for the platform across all payment methods, like cards, and new businesses, like Point-of-Sales (POS) devices
~ Building products and AI/ML solutions to proactively detect and minimize the fraud and credit losses on the platform
~ Improving efficiency of the Ops and Analytics teams via deep platformization, like Rules Engine & Platform, and Case Management System (CMS) integration
profile_positions.title: Product Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
~ Managed the Trust and Safety domain, with the primary aim of minimising the losses booked by the company due to buyer, seller, and supply chain fraud and policy abuse
~ Led the end-to-end AI/ML development in the fraud and risk domain, along with the long-term vision and roadmap
~ Headed the scaling up of Open Box Delivery (OBD), an industry-first delivery model aimed at reducing fraud while improving customer experience
~ Led the development of internal platforms with the target of improving ruleset and Machine-Learning efficiency, and increasing the efficiency of Analytics and Operations teams
~ Handled the cross-functional releases, risk assessment, and business security of major platform and business launches, including Grocery, Hyperlocal, Refurbished, and Growth
~ Oversaw the security risks on the platform, including financial risks, money laundering, and account takeovers

Achievements:
~ Awarded for leading the AI/ML charter for the fraud and risk domain and for building a roadmap and delivering substantial impact, 2022
~ Awarded for scaling up Open Box Delivery (OBD) across the country in a hyper-fast environment with changing requirements, 2022
~ Awarded with the "Patent Innovator" Award by for sustained Intellectual Property development for the company, 2022
~ Awarded for handling and reducing Hyperlocal fraud attacks in India within a quick turnaround time, 2022
profile_positions.title: Product Manager II

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
~ Managed the Trust and Safety domain, with the primary aim of minimising the losses booked by the company due to buyer, seller, and supply chain fraud and policy abuse
~ Focused on the end-to-end roadmap for the reduction of returns fraud and abuse via early detection, mitigation, and the handling of cases 
~ Functioned as the Product lead for the Data Science (DS) domain in fraud and risk with the aim of delivering impact while reducing the time to market
~ Built platforms with the aim of increasing the efficiency of the Analytics and the Ops teams, like the Case Management System (CMS) and the Rules Platform
~ Handled the cross-functional release, risk assessment, and business security of major platform and business launches, including Grocery, Hyperlocal, Refurbished, and Basket Building

Achievements:
~ Awarded as the "Value Champion" for his integral contribution to the team's growth and vision, 2021
~ Awarded for leading the tech standardisation of the service with the long-term aim of performance improvement, 2021
~ Awarded for taking up multiple initiatives to improve Customer NPS metrics and delivering strong results, 2020
~ Awarded for being part of the committee that managed employee engagement events during the first-ever virtual Big Billion Days (BBD), 2020
profile_positions.title: Product Manager I

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
~ Founded an event, content, and promotions management team focused on organising quizzes with the aim of increasing curiosity and engagement
~ Managed the end-to-end quizzing events for 30+ organizations in West Bengal, including IIM Calcutta, IIEST Shibpur, IIT Kharagpur, Haryana Vidya Mandir, Calcutta Medical College, Jadavpur University, and Friends Café
~ Oversaw participation of 5K+ enthusiasts, managed budget of INR 4L+, generated revenues of INR 7L+

Achievements:
~ Joined the elite club of IIM ABC students who have been invited to host an event in an old IIM before joining as a student!
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
~ Strategised the Go-to-Market (GTM) plan for the relaunch and penetration of Airtel Internet TV DTH Box (currently renamed as Airtel Xstream Box),
~ Designed the omni-channel marketing communication strategy, planned and supervised the market launch and execution
~ Drove adoption by leading the strategic selection of stores across Delhi NCR for the pilot testing of the GTM strategy

Achievements:
~ Awarded with the "Best Engagement Intern" award and an Apple Watch for driving the maximum social media engagement throughout the internship period, 2018
profile_positions.title: Sales And Marketing Intern

profile_positions.description:
Responsibilities:
~ Developed the In-Vehicle Infotainment (IVI) for a leading automobile brand and managed a team of 3+ members for the multi-million pound project
~ Created the Human-Machine Interface (HMI) simulation tool on C++ and reduced the time between development and deployment of engineering changes
~ Resolved 100+ defects for the project, coordinated with the client, and achieved major cost savings in HMI development
~ Designed 4+ apps on C++ for IVI systems in cars for various Widgets, Multimedia, Bluetooth, and Climate features
~ Trained 6+ junior associates and organised 15+ training sessions with total savings of 500+ work hours

Achievements:
~ International Winners of the "TCS Blitz" Award for the best executed project, considered as the highest level of recognition for the financial year, 2016
~ Rated with the highest employee performance rating for 3 successive appraisal cycles, 2015-17
~ Recipient of the "On The Spot" Award for outstanding contribution to the organization, 2017
~ Awarded with the "TCS Maitree" Prize, for dedication to the company and employee engagement, 2017
profile_positions.title: System Engineer
